valueExpression.name: basic-questions-exists
valueExpression.expression: %q1-boolean.exists() and %q2-boolean.exists() and %q3-boolean.exists() and %q4-boolean.exists() and %q5a-boolean.exists() and %q6a-boolean.exists() and %q6b-boolean.exists() and (%q6c-boolean.exists() or %q7-boolean.exists())

valueExpression.name: low-risk
valueExpression.expression: ((%q1-boolean or %q1-boolean.not()) or (%q2-boolean or %q2-boolean.not())) and (%moderate-risk-helper.not() and %high-risk-helper.not() and %severe-risk-helper.not())

item.text: In the past month, have you wished you were dead or wished you could go to sleep and not wake up?
